title: Lampeter
name: Treberfedd Farm Holiday Cottages

reviews.content: Nice place, nice pool, and nice rooms. Just warm water (in my room). Overall, good
reviews.author: Kaci Kulas

reviews.content: Very comfortable, very friendly, very reasonable and an excellent restaurant. Good location and easy drive to good beaches for snorkelling and surfing.
reviews.author: Effie Rohan

description: Self catering holiday cottages (including grade II listed thatched farmhouse) on a working organic farm near Lampeter.
